article:
Joe Brown had a shop where he _ meat. One day a woman _ into the shop at five to one. "I' m sorry. I' m late," she said. "I _ some more meat for my dinner tonight." Joe had only one _ of meat in his shop. He took it out of the fridge and said, "This is $6.50."
"That piece is too _ ,"the woman said. "Haven' t you got anything bigger?" Joe _ into the room behind his shop, put the meat into the fridge, took it out again and closed the door _ a lot of noise. Then he brought the piece of meat to the woman and said, "This piece of meat is bigger and _ expensive. It' s $8.75."
"Good," the woman said with a smile.
"Give me _ of them, please."
